content: easy magic hrc scarf 1 by assia brill reversible the magic scarf is a reversible scarf with a matching cable symmetrical pattern on both sides the pattern has a simple repeat both sides similar with 2x2 ribbing even on cables row so it can easily be a tv project it requires attention only on every eighth row to make 5 twists there is no need to add hr purl stitches for the cables because for this pattern they are already included in cast-on stitch count any yarn can be used the sample is knitted in tweedy yarn therefore the pattern is not so pronounced for a more the pattern
